name: code_quality_basic
description: Basic code quality evaluation rubric for Python functions

criteria.name: correctness
criteria.description: Does the code solve the problem correctly and handle edge cases?

excellent.input: Write a function to reverse a string
excellent.explanation: Correct implementation with type checking and edge case handling

good.input: Write a function to reverse a string

poor.input: Write a function to reverse a string
poor.explanation: Works but inefficient and overly complex

criteria.name: readability
criteria.description: Is the code clean, well-named, and easy to understand?

subcriteria.name: naming
subcriteria.description: Variable and function names are descriptive
